comment: * Listener for explicit UID account access grant changes.

methods.name: public void onAppPermissionChanged(Account account, int uid)
methods.comment:
* Called when the explicit grant state for a given UID to
         * access an account changes.
         *
         * @param account The account
         * @param uid The UID for which the grant changed

methodNames: public void onAppPermissionChanged(Account account, int uid)
